evidence.claim: Ardent Hospice and Home Health utilizes HIPAA-compliant services to ensure secure patient data management.
The company offers telehealth services which require adherence to healthcare interoperability standards such as FHIR.
Ardent employs secure messaging frameworks consistent with HL7 standards for data exchange between healthcare entities.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of using X12 transactions or API automation on public site.
